fields.description: The images in ListItem are not displayed when the window is loaded first time.The images are defined in Itemtemplate and the Listview is bound with data collection,which is sqllite db data model.Onclicking the list items,the images are displayed.
fields.summary: Image not displayed in Listview item on window loading
fields.environment:
Mac OS X 10.8.2
Apcelerator studio 3.1.2
Titanium SDK 3.1.2GA
Android SDK 4.2.2
Android emulator 7'

comments.body:

Here I have added related link for you issue. Please check that. I hope that will help to you. Those two issues are very similar. So I am going resolved this issue as duplicate. 

Thanks
